keyFacts: The document lists key personnel at Southern Trust Company, Inc. and their respective roles.
Cecile deJongh is the Office Manager, while Jeanne Brennan serves as the Head Accountant.
The document indicates that STC controls various financial operations including vendor payments and payroll.
Darren Indyke is identified as an attorney associated with HBRK.
The document provides addresses for both Southern Trust Company, Inc. and HBRK.
